input.sentences: there was a very important rally going on today .
these people were trying to show others what was going on in their lives .
many people joined them throughout the day .
it made for a very big rally .
at the end of the day i was glad that i was able to be there to witness it .
output.sentences: They had enough of poor working conditions and decided to make a change.
The coworkers rallied together one morning to take a stand.
They lined up against along the road, bringing notice to the community.
As they banded together, they started to realize the community was banding with them as well.
It was a very successful rally.
